duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and implement a comprehensive multi-year fundraising plan to support the company’s strategic plan, including corporate funding, individual gifts, and foundation/government grants.
Cultivate national philanthropic partnerships for funding opportunities in Washington, DC, and nationwide.
Represent the company externally at public appearances, speaking engagements, meetings, and networking events to share information about the company's mission.
Manage a donor portfolio, including existing corporate partners, major donors, foundation contributions, and government grants.
Identify, cultivate, and develop new funding and revenue opportunities by acquiring new philanthropic partners and expanding the existing donor base.

Oversee the development and execution of all fundraising and grant proposals, solicitations, gift agreements, grant and/or funder reports, acknowledgments, and other communications required to support ongoing fundraising activities.
Develop and implement a stewardship program that cultivates deeper ties with donors.
Manage direct reports, providing clear goals, coaching, and support.
Collaborate with outside agencies and consultants that provide fundraising, promotional, public relations, marketing, and overall brand support.
